[Dark Fighter Class Transfer]:
A Dark Fighter who has reached level 20 may change their class to a Palus Knight or an Assassin. A character may undertake the class transfer quest at level 18; if successful, they will be able to use more specialized and powerful skills than before. In order to become a Palace Knight, you must first meet Master Virgil, and in order to become an Assassin, you must first meet Triskel. They can both be found in the Town of Gludio. Think carefully about which class you want to select, then seek out the appropriate NPC.
Close Window.
